Hero.best_prices: An apartment with the best prices.

Siteplan.p1: Discover the thoughtfully designed site plan of Heartful Tower in Bekasi, offering a harmonious living environment with convenient amenities, green spaces, and strategic building arrangements. Your guide to a vibrant community in the heart of Bekasi.

About.p1: Perumnas IIDA Group was established in Indonesia in October 2017 and is a subsidiary of IIDA SANGYO Co., Ltd. PT Propernas Griya Utama (a subsidiary of PERUM PERUMNAS) also participated in investing capital in Perumnas IIDA Group as a partner.
About.p2: IIDA SANGYO Co., Ltd. is a renowned property developer under the IIDA Group Holdings umbrella, which is a publicly traded company in Japan. IIDA Group provides more than 46,000 residences each year, and approximately 30% of the Japanese population chooses homes produced by IIDA Group.
About.p3: IIDA Groups provides more than 46.000 houses anually. This means that about 30% of people who purchase detached house in Japan choose houses of IIDA Group

Facilities.title: Balance In Your Life
Facilities.desc: Enjoy the balance of your life with the facilities available to residents of the Heartful Tower Bekasi apartment.

Contact.title: Message Us
Contact.desc: Get the best offer from us via the form below.
Contact.name: Name
Contact.success: Thank you for your message. We will contact you soon.
Contact.payment_information: Payment can only be made through a transfer to the account of PT. Perumnas IIDA Group. We do not accept cash payments, and if the transfer is made from an account outside of PT. Perumnas IIDA Group, the company is not responsible.

Units.title: Our Units
Units.p1:
At Heartful Tower, we understand that every resident is unique.
That's why we offer a variety of unit types to cater to different lifestyles and preferences.
No matter which unit you choose, you'll be welcomed into a community
that values quality, comfort, and the joy of urban living.
